programme.title: Sea level
programme.desc: Malaysisk animerad film från 2011. Pub är en mini-haj som, under lek med sina vänner, upptäcker att tjuvfiskare stjäl ägg från hans lagun. Han lämnar sina hemvatten för att rädda äggen, och sin familj, och hamnar i människans farliga värld. Här måste han bevisa att han inte är för liten för att göra stor skillnad.

programme.title: Shrek forever after
programme.desc: Amerikanskt animerat från 2010. Shrek längtar tillbaka till då han var "ett riktigt träsktroll" och sluter ett avtal med Bullerskaft för att få tillbaka sitt vrål. Hela hans värld vänds upp och ner. Plötsligt har Åsnan glömt bort sin bästa vän och Fiona, som har blivit en tuff krigarprinsessa, kommer heller inte ihåg Shrek.

programme.title: Flummlarna
programme.desc: Amerikansk komedi från 2021. Följ med Op och Ed på deras galna äventyr i tid och rum! De är syskon av arten flummlar och ser mest ut som donuts med päls. Av misstag råkar vildhjärnan Op och pessimisten Ed ut för en tidsresa från Galapagosöarna 1835 till dagens Shanghai. De tar sig förvirrat fram i storstadsdjungeln, och gör den hemska upptäckten att flummlarna dog ut strax efter att de lämnade 1835. Op och Ed träffar på den smarta lilla hunden Clarance, som kanske kan hjälpa dem att rädda sig själva och alla andra flummlar.

programme.title: UglyDolls
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad barnfilm från 2019. Välkommen till staden Uglyville där vi får träffa Moxy och alla andra dockor som hyllar det udda. programme.desc: After Lucifer and Chloe have an interrupted 'moment,' the tension between the two of them makes it difficult to investigate the murder of two victims, who happen to be Lucifer's ex-flames.

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a mysterious masked killer who is poisoning college students. They also try to make sense of their new relationship, after a long-awaited kiss. Meanwhile, Charlotte visits Linda for advice on a touchy subject.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: In high school, Bob Stone was a bullied geek and Calvin was popular. Years later, Bob returns as a lethal CIA agent that needs Calvin, who's now an accountant, to help solve a major case. The two enter a world of espionage that could get them killed.

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: Five highly competitive adult friends have played the same game of tag for years during the month of May, and when the only undefeated player's wedding lands in the game month the others are confident that they can finally bring him down to size.

programme.title: Rich & Shameless
programme.desc: Beyond the 'harmless fun' of wet t-shirt competitions and booze-fueled spring breaks and into dark back rooms with Joe Francis, where he would con young girls to take part in something far more sinister than flashing on a beach.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a female combat pilot and navy hero dies in an air-show plane crash, the team must investigate if it's the fault of the pilot or the new jet that was just approved to deploy to bases globally.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team must determine why a murdered navy drone pilot was using a black market drone to obtain military surveillance and whether the drone's footage is linked to his death.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue is seen using her powers by a reporter while trying to stop a demon from kidnapping a child.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: On a visit to Alcatraz, Phoebe sees the ghost of a serial killer escape to exact revenge.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Leo shows up, victim of a dark lighter's lethal poison tipped arrow.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Charmed Ones get stuck in a time loop while trying to save a boy who was kidnapped.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride is sent a partner from the Australian Defence Force Investigation Service, Special Agent Naomi Parsons, after an Australian Royal Navy lieutenant, who was key to international negotiations on nuclear weapons, is murdered.Guests: Kate Beahan..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team's participation in the annual Red Dress Run is cut short when a Petty Officer is found dead in the French Quarter from a drug overdose.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The life of a genius navy coder employed by Brody's mother, Olivia, hangs in the balance after the heart intended for his transplant is stolen. Olivia joins the team as they race to locate the missing organ.Guests: Annie Potts..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and Sonja are ambushed and on the run after traveling to Texas to escort a key witness for the trial of an infamous arms dealer that Pride apprehended.Guests: Jay Thomas..

programme.title: Tag

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: After a First World War pilot crashes near a mythical island, he meets a race of warrior women who live there. Their princess leaves with him to help stop the war raging in the outside world, setting out on the path to becoming the legendary Wonder Woman.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: A man learns that he is the half-human, half-Atlantean heir to an undersea kingdom that is ruled by his half-brother who plans to wage a devastating war on the surface world, forcing him to become a leader and challenge his brother for the throne.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: During a city-wide blackout that impedes law enforcement and emergency response teams, Pride vows to solve the murder of a family friend's fiancé.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The murder of a marine provides new clues in the first case Pride and Lasalle ever worked together, just before Hurricane Katrina struck the city and washed away any evidence. Also, the team celebrates Thanksgiving together in Pride's bar.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A string of Christmas burglaries turns deadly and the evidence leads the team to Wade's adopted son, Danny. Also, Lasalle and Brody tease Sonja about the high stakes of drawing Pride in the team's secret Santa holiday exchange.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While Pride and the New Orleans team investigate a Russian sleeper agent who was involved with Abby's brother, Sebastian flies to D.C. to partner with Abby on the forensics in the case. Bishop drives through the night to deliver a package to New Orleans.Guests: Tyler Ritter..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and the team investigate the murder of an immigrant petty officer that was staged as a suicide. Also, the team secretly creates an online dating profile for Special Agent Pride.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters face a cloven-hoofed demon that undoes all the spells they have cast.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Phoebe has a vision of herself being burnt to death the sisters travel to the future.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue gets trapped inside a painting with a dangerous warlock.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Piper books music star Dishwalla at her night club only to discover he has evil manager.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride opens his bar to the public with a Fat Tuesday party, but the celebration is cut short when he and Mayor Douglas Hamilton are both kidnapped from their respective Mardi Gras events and held hostage by an unknown assailant.Guests: Glen David Andrews, Jon Cleary..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A mystery man saves the life of a lieutenant and then disappears from the scene. Later on, the NCIS team unravels a new case when forensic evidence suggests he is a soldier who was captured in Afghanistan years ago and never found.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After tracking stolen navy TNT to a cocaine warehouse, Special Agent Pride and the team uncover a domestic ring that is producing their own cocaine and is headed by Sonja's childhood friend.Guests: Samaire Armstrong..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team protects a local DJ from a threatening perpetrator and investigates the murder of a navy captain who was attacked while on-air with the radio show. Also, Pride's daughter, Laurel, returns home to discuss her future plans.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS Special Agent Brody believes that a sailor hit by a party bus in the French Quarter is connected to her sister's death after the team discovers similarities between the two. Also, the team prepares for St. Patrick's Day festivities in New Orleans.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: When four young misfits are transported to an alternate universe, they take on altered physical forms and new abilities. Together they must learn to harness their new powers and save Earth from an old friend who's now an enemy.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: A boy has the power to turn into a grown-up superhero.
